p: In the second panel, notice a drop-down list with Select a world written. Click on it and select Alone; you will see Reeborg appear in the world, in the bottom left corner, as well as some buttons on the top.

p.small: You might have to minimize this window, or move it to the left in order to see Reeborg.

p: Click on Execute and watch what happens.
You had Reeborg take its first steps. In the editor panel, there is a single instruction:

That is the command that Reeborg executed. Notice how the "Execute" button is now disabled; click on "Reload" to enable it again, and try to run it again. By the way, a synonym for Execute is Run (as in, run a program). When you are ready, move to the next lesson.
